hevs.gdx2d.components.physics

Class PhysicsChain

  • java.lang.Object
    • hevs.gdx2d.components.physics.PhysicsChain
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DrawableObject

    public class PhysicsChain
extends java.lang.Object
implements DrawableObject
    A physics chain (!) that connects two points with a given number of rigid segments that are generated randomly. The segments can either be generated randomly (with edges) or with a smooth Catmull-Rom interpolated spline. See DemoChainPhysics demo
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Pierre-Andre Mudry (mui)
